name: Maxie
info: As the leader of Team Magma, Maxie dreams of creating an ideal world for humans. He’s a logical thinker and willing to make sacrifices to accomplish his objectives.

moves.name: Dire Hit +
moves.effect: Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.effect: The user gets ready to attack. Using this move again will cause the user to leave this posture, then attack. No other actions can be taken while ready to attack. The preparation period is skipped when the weather is sunny, and the user will attack right away.

moves.name: Expand the Land!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack and Sp. Atk by 2 stat ranks. Lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def by 1 stat rank. In addition, raises the user’s Attack and accuracy by 1 stat rank when the weather is sunny. Applies the Supereffective ↑ Next effect to the user when the weather is sunny.

passives.name: Hoenn Pride
passives.description: Powers up the physical attack moves of all allied sync pairs by 20%. Reduces physical attack move damage taken by all allied sync pairs by 25%. The more allied sync pairs with the Hoenn theme you have on your team, the higher these percentages are. (Each additional sync pair powers up moves by 15% and reduces damage by 3%. The maximum power-up is 50%, and the maximum damage reduction is 31%.)

passives.name: Sunburst
passives.description: Makes the weather sunny the first time the user enters a battle each battle.

passives.name: Solar Surge 3
passives.description: Powers up the user’s moves when the weather is sunny.

passives.name: Drought Alert 5
passives.description: Extends the duration of sunny weather when the weather turns sunny while the user is on the field.

grid.bonus: Dire Hit +:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Dire Hit +:Critical Eye 1- Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 1 stat rank when its move is successful.
Solar Beam:Critical Strike 1- Powers up the user’s attacks when they become critical hits.
Solar Beam:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Solar Beam:Charging Sun 5- Powers up the user’s moves when the weather is sunny.
Solar Beam:Mind Games 9- Lowers the target’s Sp. Def by one stat rank when the user’s attack move is successful.
Precipice Blades:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Expand the Land!:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Endurance- When the user enters battle with full HP, applies the Enduring effect to it.
Superduper Effective 1- Powers up moves that are super effective.
Solar Flare 5- Powers up the user’s sync moves when the weather is sunny.
Healing Sun 1- Restores the user’s HP whenever its Pokémon takes an action while the weather is sunny.
Solar Propulsion 1- Has a chance (20%) of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when the user’s move is successful while the weather is sunny.
One with the Sun- Prevents the user from flinching, becoming confused, or becoming trapped when the weather is sunny.
Super Sun 4- Has a chance (50%) of applying the Supereffective ↑ Next effect to the user when its Pokémon uses a move while the weather is sunny.
Solar Sync- Makes the weather sunny the first time the user’s sync move is used each battle.
